text: Today, @MS_SouthNassau vaccinated our area’s #HometownHeroes, our #FirstResponders. Local #EMS and volunteer #firefighters from Freeport, Bellmore, N. Bellmore, Lynbrook, Lawrence-Cedarhurst, Oceanside and more all rolled up their sleeves to receive the #COVID19 #vaccine. https://t.co/SmtJTEm0wU
